//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float2 DistanceFadeParameters;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_1;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_2;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowTexture;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 UniformPixelScalars_0;
//   bool bEnableDistanceShadowFading;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   bEnableDistanceShadowFading  b1       1
//   DNEResolution                c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   UniformPixelScalars_0        c7       1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c8       1
//   DistanceFadeParameters       c9       1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s3       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1             s4       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2             s5       1
//   ShadowTexture                s6       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, 0.5, 0.0625, 0, -100
    def c5, 0.5, 1, 2, -1
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v4
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --only-autofixed --ignore-parse-errors CRC32_BD87BD40_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    dp3_pp r0.x, v3, v3
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v2
    texld_pp r2, v0, s6
    mov_sat_pp r2.x, r2.x
    mov r2.y, c2.x
    texld_pp r2, r2, s0
    if b0
      mad r0.yz, vPos.xxyw, c0.xxyw, c0.xzww
      mul r3.xy, r0.yzzw, v4.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r4, c2.yzzw, s1
        add r0.y, -r4.y, v4.w
        mad r3.z, r4.x, r0.y, r3.x
        mov r3.xy, r3.zyzw
        mov r0.y, v4.w
      else
        mov r0.y, v4.w
      endif
      rcp r0.y, r0.y
      mul r0.yz, r0.y, r3.xxyw
      mad r0.yz, r0, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r3, r0.yzzw, s2
      mul_pp r0.yzw, r3.xxyz, r3.xxyz
      if b1
        dp3 r1.w, v4, v4
        rsq r1.w, r1.w
        rcp r1.w, r1.w
        add r1.w, -r1.w, c9.x
        mul_sat_pp r1.w, r1.w, c9.y
        mul_pp r1.w, r1.w, r1.w
        mad_pp r2.y, r3.w, r3.w, -r2.x
        mad_pp r2.yzw, r1.w, r2.y, r2.x
      else
        mov_pp r2.yzw, r2.x
      endif
      mul_pp r0.yzw, r0, r2
    else
      mov_pp r0.yzw, r2.x
    endif
    mov r1.w, c2.w
    max r2.x, -c7.y, r1.w
    min r1.w, r2.x, c2.z
    mov r2.xy, c5
    mad r2.x, c7.y, r2.x, r2.y
    mad_pp r2.yz, v3.xxyw, r0.x, r1.xxyw
    texld_pp r3, v1, s4
    mad r3.xyz, r3, c5.z, c5.w
    add r2.yz, r2, -r3.xxyw
    mad_sat r2.yz, r2, c2.x, c2.x
    texld r4, r2.yzzw, s5
    lrp_sat r0.x, r4.x, r2.x, r1.w
    texld r2, v1, s3
    dp3_sat r1.x, r1, r3
    mad r1.xyw, r1.x, r2.xyzz, r0.x
    mul r2.xyz, r1.z, c4
    cmp r2.xyz, r1.z, r2, c2.z
    mad r1.xyz, r1.xyww, c4.w, r2
    mul r0.xyz, r0.yzww, r1
    mul oC0.xyz, r0, c8
    mov oC0.w, c2.z

// approximately 69 instruction slots used (7 texture, 62 arithmetic)
